column1: The Shire-hobbits or Shire-folk were the Hobbits that lived in the Shire
column2: as opposed to Bree-hobbits and Bucklanders. They represented the majority of the whole Hobbitish population of Middle-earth. Shire-hobbits called everyone else "Outsiders".

column1: The Hobbits of the Shire were considered the most rustic and pastoral of their kind. The most important family among the Shire-hobbits were the Took Family of the Westfarthing
